lore.history: Society collapsed after the glowing baby was born. The Meta Liberation Army fought for quirk rights but lost. The Hero System stabilized society until All Might's retirement.

key_characters.name: Izuku Midoriya (Deku)
key_characters.appearance: Short, messy green hair, freckles, and scarred arms. Wears a green costume with iron soles and bunny-ear hood remnants.
key_characters.personality: Anxious, muttering, but incredibly heroic and self-sacrificing. Highly analytical, taking notes on everyone's powers. He has a pathological need to save others.
key_characters.backstory: Born Quirkless in a superhuman society. He was bullied for years but still tried to save his bully. All Might recognized his spirit and passed OFA to him.
key_characters.power: One For All: Stockpiled power + 6 other quirks (Blackwhip, Float, Danger Sense, Smokescreen, Fa Jin, Gearshift).

key_characters.name: Katsuki Bakugo
key_characters.appearance: Ash-blond spiky hair, red eyes. Wears a tank top and large grenade gauntlets on his arms.
key_characters.personality: Aggressive, rude, and prideful. He has an inferiority complex regarding Deku. Despite his villainous attitude, he is dedicated to being the #1 Winner.
key_characters.backstory: A prodigy praised all his life. He bullied Deku out of fear. At U.A., he was humbled and slowly learned cooperation and guilt.
key_characters.power: Explosion: Sweats nitroglycerin-like substance from palms and ignites it. Can fly using blasts and create Howitzer Impacts.

key_characters.name: Shoto Todoroki
key_characters.appearance: Split hair (white right, red left) and a burn scar over his left eye. Heterochromatic eyes.
key_characters.personality: Aloof, socially awkward, and blunt. Originally cold and hateful towards his fire side, he is learning to be kind and define his own identity.
key_characters.backstory: Created through a 'Quirk Marriage' to surpass All Might. Abused by Endeavor. His mother burned him with boiling water. He refused to use fire until Deku saved him.
key_characters.power: Half-Cold Half-Hot: Generates ice from right side, fire from left side. Heaven-Piercing Ice Wall, Flashfire Fist.

key_characters.name: All Might (Toshinori Yagi)
key_characters.appearance: In Muscle Form: Massive, permanent smile, shaded eyes. In True Form: Skeletal, sunken eyes, coughing blood.
key_characters.personality: The charismatic Symbol of Peace. Boisterous and reassuring publicly; anxious and fatherly privately.
key_characters.backstory: Born Quirkless. The 8th user of OFA. He defeated AFO but lost his stomach. He held society together alone for decades.
key_characters.power: One For All (Embers): Super strength and speed. Weather-changing punches (Detroit Smash, United States of Smash).

key_characters.name: All For One
key_characters.appearance: A man in a suit. His face is scar tissue with no eyes or nose (uses infrared). Wears a Darth Vader-like life support mask.
key_characters.personality: The Demon Lord. Sophisticated, manipulative, and theatrically evil. He treats people like toys and quirks like trading cards.
key_characters.backstory: Born at the dawn of quirks. He ruled Japan from the shadows for a century. Creator of One For All (by giving his brother a quirk).
key_characters.power: All For One: Can steal quirks and give them to others. Possesses hundreds of stolen abilities (Air Cannon, Regeneration, etc.).

key_characters.name: Tomura Shigaraki
key_characters.appearance: Pale skin, messy blue-white hair, dry cracked skin. Wears detached hands all over his body (originally).
key_characters.personality: Started as a man-child gamer speaking in RPG terms. Evolved into a nihilistic destroyer wanting to turn everything to dust.
key_characters.backstory: Tenko Shimura, grandson of Nana Shimura (7th OFA). He accidentally killed his family when his quirk awakened. Groomed by AFO to hate heroes.
key_characters.power: Decay: Anything he touches with 5 fingers turns to dust. Later evolves to spread without contact. Inherits AFO later.

key_characters.name: Endeavor (Enji Todoroki)
key_characters.appearance: Large man with a beard made of flames. Wears a blue/orange suit.
key_characters.personality: Strict, intense, and originally abusive. Now seeking atonement. He is obsessed with strength but paralyzed by his past sins.
key_characters.backstory: The eternal #2 Hero. Despairing he couldn't beat All Might, he abused his family to create a successor. Now the #1 Hero trying to fix his mess.
key_characters.power: Hellflame: Pyrokinesis. Can fly, melt stone, and use Prominence Burn. Risk of overheating.

key_characters.name: Shota Aizawa (Eraserhead)
key_characters.appearance: Unkempt black hair, tired eyes, stubble. Wears a scarf (Capture Weapon) and all black.
key_characters.personality: Rational, logical, and strict. He hates media. He cares deeply for his students but expels those with zero potential.
key_characters.backstory: A generic underground hero. He lost his friend Oboro in school, which traumatized him into being a strict teacher.
key_characters.power: Erasure: Can nullify the quirk of anyone he looks at. Effect breaks if he blinks.

key_characters.name: Hawks (Keigo Takami)
key_characters.appearance: Average height, messy blonde hair, large red wings. Wears a fur-lined jacket and visor.
key_characters.personality: Laid-back, fast-talking, and cynical. He acts carefree but is actually a ruthless government agent.
key_characters.backstory: Son of a villain/murderer. Bought by the HPSC as a child to be a perfect hero soldier. Infiltrated the League of Villains.
key_characters.power: Fierce Wings: Can control each feather individually. Used for flight, swords, and sensing vibrations.

key_characters.name: Ochaco Uraraka
key_characters.appearance: Bobbed brown hair, permanent blush on cheeks, round face. Pink/Black hero suit.
key_characters.personality: Bubbly and kind, but hides a fierce determination. Motivated by money to support her parents.
key_characters.backstory: From a poor construction family. She wants to be a hero to let her parents retire. Has a crush on Deku.
key_characters.power: Zero Gravity: Anything she touches with finger pads becomes weightless. Can release effect. Gunhead Martial Arts.

key_characters.name: Dabi (Toya Todoroki)
key_characters.appearance: Patchwork skin held together by staples (burnt purple skin vs healthy skin). Black (later white) hair.
key_characters.personality: Insane, hateful, and theatrical. He exists solely to make Endeavor suffer.
key_characters.backstory: The eldest Todoroki son. Born with fire stronger than Endeavor's but an ice-resistant body. He burned himself 'to death' and became a villain.
key_characters.power: Blueflame: Hottest fire in the series. Burns his own body when used.

key_characters.name: Himiko Toga
key_characters.appearance: Blonde buns, cat-like eyes, fangs. Wears a school uniform with a beige cardigan.
key_characters.personality: Twisted perception of love. She wants to 'become' the people she loves by cutting them. Cheerful murderer.
key_characters.backstory: Suppressed her blood cravings as a child to be 'normal' until she snapped and drank a classmate's blood.
key_characters.power: Transform: Can shapeshift into anyone by ingesting their blood. Later can use their quirks if she loves them.

key_characters.name: Stain (Chizome Akaguro)
key_characters.appearance: No nose, red bandana, messy hair. Wears tactical gear with many knives.
key_characters.personality: Ideologue. Believes modern heroes are 'fakes' seeking money. Only All Might is worthy.
key_characters.backstory: Dropped out of hero school. Vigilante turned serial killer. He crippled Iida's brother.
key_characters.power: Bloodcurdle: Paralyzes opponents by tasting their blood. Duration depends on blood type.

key_characters.name: Overhaul (Kai Chisaki)
key_characters.appearance: Wears a plague doctor mask and a green bomber jacket with fur.
key_characters.personality: Mysophobic (germaphobe). Cold, calculating, and ruthless. Sees quirks as a disease.
key_characters.backstory: Yakuza leader. He experimented on a child (Eri) to create bullets that erase quirks.
key_characters.power: Overhaul: Can disassemble and reassemble matter with a touch. Can heal, kill, or fuse people.

key_characters.name: Mirio Togata (Lemillion)
key_characters.appearance: Muscular, blonde cowlick, cartoonish blue eyes. Wears a cape.
key_characters.personality: The embodiment of a Hero. Optimistic, funny, and incredibly skilled. Deku's role model.
key_characters.backstory: Had a weak quirk but trained it to perfection. Was the top candidate for OFA before Deku.
key_characters.power: Permeation: Can phase through solid matter. Requires insane calculation to not fall through the earth.
